column1: barred, and said that the last words definitely refer to a  year which would be
governed by the 1938 amendment. Sub-s. (4) of s. 34 reads:
“A notice under clause (a) of sub-section (1) may be issued at any time
notwithstanding that at the time of the issue of the notice, the period of 8
years specified in that sub-section before its amendment by clause (a) of
section 18 of the Finance Act, 1956 (18 of 1956), had expired in respect of the
year to which the notice relates”. [emphasis added]
